title: Another Florida Case Puts Crosshairs On 'Stand Your Ground'
teaser: Marissa Alexander, a Jacksonville woman behind bars for three years for firing a "warning shot" near her estranged husband, was recently released. NPR's Arun Rath talks with Larry Hannan of the Florida Times-Union.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
